mapper.insert: insert into member_info(memberId,memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberAge, memberMobile,memberMbti) values (#{memberId},#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAge}, #{memberMobile},#{memberMbti})
mapper.select: select * from member_info where memberId =#{memberId} and memberPassword =#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_info set memberAge=#{memberAge}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile}, memberMbti=#{memberMbti} where memberId=#{memberId}
